title: The conversation we're not having about digital child abuse
description: We need to talk to kids about the risks they face online, says information security expert Sebastián Bortnik. In this talk, Bortnik discusses the issue of "grooming" -- the sexual predation of children by adults on the internet -- and outlines the conversations we need to start having about technology to keep our kids safe. (In Spanish with English subtitles)
author: Sebastián Bortnik
keywords: TED, talks, activism, children, communication, family, computers, parenting, social change, society, sexual violence, technology, TEDx, Internet, TED en Español
